title: Runaway Snowball
description: In Runaway Snowball, a giant snowball gets away from Timothy, causing problems for everyone below him on the hill. The story supports emergent readers by providing colorful illustrations and a repetitive text. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine cause and effect as well as how to recognize and use comparative adjectives.
meta: bigger, breaks, hill, rolls, snowball, snowman
Cause and Effect : Determine cause and effect
Comparative Adjectives : Recognize and use comparative adjectives
Compound Words : Identify and use compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
